org.apache.ambari.server.serveraction

Interface ServerAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPrepareKerberosServerAction, AbstractServerAction, AbstractUpgradeServerAction, AddComponentAction, AutoSkipFailedSummaryAction, CleanupServerAction, ComponentVersionCheckAction, ConfigureAction, ConfigureAmbariIdentitiesServerAction, CreateAndConfigureAction, CreateKeytabFilesServerAction, CreatePrincipalsServerAction, DeleteUnsupportedServicesAndComponents, DestroyPrincipalsServerAction, FinalizeKerberosServerAction, FinalizeUpgradeAction, KerberosKeytabsAction, KerberosServerAction, ManualStageAction, PluginUpgradeServerAction, PostUserCreationHookServerAction, PreconfigureKerberosAction, PrepareDisableKerberosServerAction, PrepareEnableKerberosServerAction, PrepareKerberosIdentitiesServerAction, UpdateDesiredRepositoryAction, UpdateKerberosConfigsServerAction, UpgradeUserKerberosDescriptor, YarnNodeManagerCapacityCalculation

    public interface ServerAction
    ServerAction is an interface to be implemented by all server-based actions/tasks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACTION_NAME 
      static String ACTION_USER_NAME 
      static int DEFAULT_LONG_RUNNING_TASK_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
      The default timeout (in seconds) to use for potentially long running tasks such as creating Kerberos principals and generating Kerberos keytab files
      static String WRAPPED_CLASS_NAME
      The name of the class that the server action is going to delegate to.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandReport execute(ConcurrentMap<String,Object> requestSharedDataContext)
      Executes this ServerAction

      This is typically called by the ServerActionExecutor in it's own thread, but there is no guarantee that this is the case.
      ExecutionCommand getExecutionCommand()
      Gets the ExecutionCommand property of this ServerAction.
      HostRoleCommand getHostRoleCommand()
      Gets the HostRoleCommand property of this ServerAction.
      void setExecutionCommand(ExecutionCommand command)
      Sets the ExecutionCommand property of this ServerAction.
      void setHostRoleCommand(HostRoleCommand hostRoleCommand)
      Sets the HostRoleCommand property of this ServerAction.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_NAME

        static final String ACTION_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_USER_NAME

        static final String ACTION_USER_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WRAPPED_CLASS_NAME

        static final String WRAPPED_CLASS_NAME
        The name of the class that the server action is going to delegate to. This is used in cases were a server action is being told to run another non-server action, such as during an upgrade.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_LONG_RUNNING_TASK_TIMEOUT_SECONDS

        static final int DEFAULT_LONG_RUNNING_TASK_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
        The default timeout (in seconds) to use for potentially long running tasks such as creating Kerberos principals and generating Kerberos keytab files
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getExecutionCommand

        ExecutionCommand getExecutionCommand()
        Gets the ExecutionCommand property of this ServerAction.
        Returns:
        the ExecutionCommand property of this ServerAction

      • setExecutionCommand

        void setExecutionCommand(ExecutionCommand command)
        Sets the ExecutionCommand property of this ServerAction.

        This property is expected to be set by the creator of this ServerAction before calling execute.

        Parameters:
        command - the ExecutionCommand data to set

      • getHostRoleCommand

        HostRoleCommand getHostRoleCommand()
        Gets the HostRoleCommand property of this ServerAction.
        Returns:
        the HostRoleCommand property of this ServerAction

      • setHostRoleCommand

        void setHostRoleCommand(HostRoleCommand hostRoleCommand)
        Sets the HostRoleCommand property of this ServerAction.

        This property is expected to be set by the creator of this ServerAction before calling execute.

        Parameters:
        hostRoleCommand - the HostRoleCommand data to set

      • execute

        CommandReport execute(ConcurrentMap<String,Object> requestSharedDataContext)
               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException,
                      InterruptedException
        Executes this ServerAction

        This is typically called by the ServerActionExecutor in it's own thread, but there is no guarantee that this is the case. It is expected that the ExecutionCommand and HostRoleCommand properties are set before calling this method.

        Parameters:
        requestSharedDataContext - a Map to be used a shared data among all ServerActions related to a given request
        Returns:
        a CommandReport declaring the status of the task
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        InterruptedException
